name: Bassai Dai
description: Bassai Dai, meaning 'to penetrate the fortress (major)', is a powerful kata emphasizing strong linear movements and dynamic techniques. This kata demonstrates the concept of breaking through an opponent's defense with explosive power and varied timing. The kata features the distinctive mountain punch (yama-zuki) combination, powerful blocks, and demonstrates both offensive and defensive applications. Bassai Dai is characterized by its strong forward momentum, changing rhythms, and the principle of overwhelming force. It is traditionally learned at 1st Dan (black belt) level in the JKA curriculum.

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with hands placed on thighs

subMoves.hiragana: ようい
subMoves.description: Place the right fist in the left hand. The Left hand is slightly bent without grabbing the right hand.

subMoves.hiragana: さしょうそえて みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.description: Raise the right knee and leap forward, resting the right foot on the ground in the kosa-dachi position. At the same time, perform a double inside-outside right block (morote-uke), the left hand reinforcement of the right forearm

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Turn the head to the left, extend the left leg back by crossing the left hand in front of you, under the right arm. Perform a mid-level left-to-outside block (uchi-uke) by swiveling the pelvis to the left in zenkutsu-dachi position, the right fist in hikite

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうでうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: On the spot, make a blocking of the right arm level medium (uchi-uke), from the inside towards the outside, with a strong rotation of the hips. The right shoulder is brought forward and the hips are Gyaku-Hanmi, always in zenkutsu-dachi position, the left fist in hikite

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん そとうけ
subMoves.description: Pivot 180° by executing a medium-level left inside-outside block (soto-uke) in zenkutsu-dachi position, the right fist in hikite

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうでうけ
subMoves.description: On the spot, make a blocking of the middle right arm (uchi-uke), from inside to outside, with a strong rotation of the hips. The right shoulder is brought forward and the bust is 3/4, still in zenkutsu-dachi position, the left fist in hikite

moves.japaneseName: Migi gedan sukui-uke / Migi chūdan soto-uke

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだん すくいうけ
subMoves.description: Execute right lower level scooping block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん そとうけ
subMoves.description: Follow with right middle level outside block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうでうけ
subMoves.description: On the spot, make a blocking of the middle left arm (uchi-uke), from the inside to the outside, with a strong rotation of the hips. The left shoulder is brought forward and the bust is 3/4, always in zenkutsu-dachi position, the right fist in hikite

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ こしかまえ
subMoves.description: Bring the left foot inward towards the right foot in the hachiji-dachi position, while bringing the left fist vertical on the right fist in hikite at the hip right

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん たてしゅとうけ
subMoves.description: Execute left shoulder level vertical knife hand block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ちょくづき
subMoves.description: On the spot, give a direct right punch to the middle level (choku-zuki), in position hachiji-dachi, the left fist in hikite

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうでうけ
subMoves.description: On the spot, always in position hachiji-dachi, execute a right blocking at the middle level, from the inside towards the outside (uchi-uke), by pivoting powerfully the pelvis towards left. The right leg extends, and the left knee flexes slightly

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん ちょくづき
subMoves.description: On the spot, give a direct left punch on the middle level (choku-zuki), in position hachiji-dachi, the right fist in hikite

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうでうけ
subMoves.description: On the spot, always in position hachiji-dachi, execute a blocking left at the middle level, from the inside towards the outside (uchi-uke), by pivoting powerfully the pelvis towards the right. The left leg extends, and the right knee bends slightly

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.description: Advance the right foot in the starting axis of the kata, in Kōkutsu-dachi position, while performing a blocking of the sword of the right hand at the middle level (shutō-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.description: Advance the left foot in the starting axis of the kata, in Kōkutsu-dachi position, while performing a blocking of the sword of the left hand at the middle level (shutō-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.description: Advance the right foot in the starting axis of the kata, in Kōkutsu-dachi position, while performing a blocking of the saber of the right hand at the middle level (shutō-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Retreat the right foot in the starting axis of the kata, in Kōkutsu-dachi position, while performing a blocking of the sword of the left hand at the middle level (shutō-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: りょうしょう ちゅうだん つかみうけ
subMoves.description: Shift into a zenkutsu-dachi (gyaku-hanmi) position. At the same time, drawing a half circle, bring the right hand under the left hand, placing the hand out toward the front of the left hand so that the left fingertips are very close to the right wrist. Slightly bending both elbows, the underarms and elbows are kept tight, with the back of both hands facing upwards, and the right elbow at a distance of one fist and a half away from the right side of the body. The left hand doesn't move when the right hand is held out in front of the left hand. The two hands do not touch each other.

subMoves.hiragana: りょうしょう つかみよせ
subMoves.description: Lift the right knee high in the created space between the arms. At the same time, make fists and pull the fists side by side sharply upward at the level of the right nipple, with the back of both fists facing upwards, and thrust the right leg downward, using the outside edge of the right foot.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ そくとう げだん けこみ
subMoves.description: The thrust kick is aimed at slightly above the hipbone. KIAI at the end of this movement.

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Look to the left, in the direction of the back (ura-shōmen). Turn left 180 degrees into back stance while executing left middle level knife-hand block (shutō-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち

subMoves.hiragana: もろて じょうだん あげうけ
subMoves.description: Keeping the left foot position unchanged, bring the right foot toward the left foot. At the same time, pull upward both fists in front and slightly above the forehead.

subMoves.hiragana: りょうけんつい ちゅうだん はさみづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Keeping the left foot unchanged, slide the right foot forward. At the same time, pull both fists apart one fist distance and drawing a half-circle, with the back of the fists facing outwards, strike to each side of the abdomen,

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ けん ちゅうだん づき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Execute right middle level punch while sliding (yori-ashi) in front stance

moves.japaneseName: Sashō jodan nagashi-uke, Migi shutō gedan uchikomi

subMoves.technique: Sashō jōdan nagashi-uke, Migi shutō gedan uchikomi
subMoves.hiragana: さしょう じょうだん ながしうけ みぎ しゅとう げだん うちこみ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Turn left 180 degrees into front stance while executing simultaneous high-level deflecting block (nagashi-uke) with the left arm and low-level knife-hand strike (shutō-uchi) with the right hand

subMoves.technique: Migi sokumen jōdan uchi-uke, hidari sokumen gedan-uke
subMoves.hiragana: みぎ そくめん じょうだん うちうけ ひだり そくめん げだんうけ
subMoves.description: Bring the left foot against the right foot in heisoku-dachi position while executing simultaneous right high-level side block (sokumen-uke) and left low-level side block (sokumen-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: そくめん みぎ ふみこみ みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Turn right 90 degrees into kiba-dachi position while executing right side stomp (fumikomi) into right downward block (gedan-barai)

moves.japaneseName: Hidari tekubi hidari sokumen chūdan kake-uke

subMoves.technique: Hidari tekubi hidari sokumen chūdan kake-uke
subMoves.hiragana: ひだり てくび ひだり そくめん ちゅうだん かけうけ
subMoves.description: Look left while executing left wrist hooking block (kake-uke) to the left mid-level side (sokumen)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ みかづきげり
subMoves.description: Lift the right knee high and execute a right crescent kick (mikazuki-geri) by sweeping the space in front of you, rest the foot in kiba-dachi position

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ えんぴうち
subMoves.description: At the same time, strike with the right elbow (empi-uchi) to the front, the left fist (empi-uchi)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: On the spot, proceed directly by lowering the right fist (gedan-uke), the left fist in contact with the right elbow, always in kiba-dachi position

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Continue with left downward block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Finish with right downward block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり こしかまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Turn the head to the right by slightly moving the right foot to arrive in zenkutsu-dachi position. At the same time, pull the fists above the left hip, right fist standing above the left fist in hikite (koshi-kamae)

subMoves.hiragana: やまづき
subMoves.description: Then hit 2 fists simultaneously (yama-zuki), the left fist on the face and the right fist on the middle level. At the arrival of the technique, the 2 fists are in the same vertical axis and the bust leaning forward

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ こしかまえ
subMoves.description: Bring the right foot back against the left foot in the heisoku-dachi position, while bringing the 2 fists above the right hip, left fist standing above the right fist in hikite (koshi-kamae)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ふみこみ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Lift up the left knee and carry a crushed left kick (fumikomi) in zenkutsu-dachi position

subMoves.hiragana: やまづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: While simultaneously striking 2 fists (yama-zuki), the right fist at the level of the face and the left fist at the middle level. At the arrival of the technique, the 2 fists are in the same vertical axis and the bust leaning forward

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり こしかまえ
subMoves.description: Bring the left foot back against the left foot in heisoku-dachi position, while bringing the 2 fists above the left hip, right fist standing above the right fist on the left (koshi-kamae)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ふみこみ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Lift up the right knee and carry a right crushed kick (fumikomi) in zenkutsu-dachi position

subMoves.hiragana: やまづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: While simultaneously striking 2 fists (yama-zuki), the left fist at the level of the face and the right fist at the middle level. At the arrival of the technique, the 2 fists are in the same vertical axis and the bust leaning forward

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだん すくいうけ
subMoves.description: Pivot on the right foot, the left leg performing a 90° arc. Put the foot in zenkutsu-dachi position. The right fist describes a large circular movement from the left shoulder to achieve a blocking spoon (sukui-uke). The left fist is positioned in hikité

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだん すくいうけ
subMoves.description: Pivot on both feet to the right. The left fist describes a large circular movement from the right shoulder to achieve a blocking spoon (sukui-uke). The right fist is positioned in hikité

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.description: Turn the head 45° to the right, regroup the left foot against the right foot and advance the right foot at a 45° angle to the right in Kōkutsu-dachi position, while performing a blocking the cutting edge of the right hand at the middle level (shutō-uke)

subMoves.hiragana: しゅとうけ
subMoves.description: Turn the head 90° to the left, slowly move the right foot 90° backwards always in Kōkutsu-dachi position, the upper body keeping the same position (shutō-uke) to this rear direction

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとうけ
subMoves.description: Bring the right foot under your right shoulder, then advance the left foot in Kōkutsu-dachi position, while performing a blocking of the cutting edge of the left hand (shutō-uke)
